item.title: [MicrosoftDocs/dynamics-365-unified-operations-public] PR #5163: MSM Copilot experiences
item.description: Pull Request by lavanyapg: MSM Copilot experiences. Documents five new Copilot features for Microsoft Sustainability Manager including document analysis, calculation model generation, report generation, data querying, and fact finding.
